verses.text: \w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w scribes|strong="G1122"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w from|strong="G2064"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w* \w gathered|strong="G4863"\w* \w around|strong="G4314"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2532"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w on|strong="G2902"\w* returning \w from|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* market, \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w do|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w eat|strong="G2068"\w* \w unless|strong="G1437"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w wash|strong="G3361"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w there|strong="G2532"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w other|strong="G4183"\w* traditions \w for|strong="G2532"\w* \w them|strong="G3739"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w observe|strong="G2902"\w*, \w including|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* washing \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w cups|strong="G4221"\w*, \w pitchers|strong="G3582"\w*, \w kettles|strong="G5473"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* couches \w for|strong="G2532"\w* dining.

\w So|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w scribes|strong="G1122"\w* \w questioned|strong="G1905"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2532"\w*: “\w Why|strong="G5101"\w* \w do|strong="G5101"\w* \w Your|strong="G1223"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w walk|strong="G4043"\w* \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w tradition|strong="G3862"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w elders|strong="G4245"\w*? \w Jesus|strong="G3004"\w* \w answered|strong="G3004"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*, “\w Isaiah|strong="G2268"\w* \w prophesied|strong="G4395"\w* \w correctly|strong="G2573"\w* \w about|strong="G4012"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w hypocrites|strong="G5273"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w it|strong="G3754"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w*: ‘\w These|strong="G3778"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w honor|strong="G5091"\w* \w Me|strong="G1473"\w* \w with|strong="G4012"\w* \w their|strong="G4012"\w* \w lips|strong="G5491"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w their|strong="G4012"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w far|strong="G4206"\w* \w from|strong="G3588"\w* \w Me|strong="G1473"\w*.

\w They|strong="G1161"\w* \w worship|strong="G4576"\w* \w Me|strong="G1473"\w* \w in|strong="G1161"\w* \w vain|strong="G3155"\w*; \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w teach|strong="G1321"\w* \w as|strong="G1161"\w* \w doctrine|strong="G1319"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w precepts|strong="G1778"\w* \w of|strong="G1319"\w* men.’

You \w have|strong="G3588"\w* disregarded \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w commandment|strong="G1785"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w to|strong="G2316"\w* keep \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w tradition|strong="G3862"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w men|strong="G3588"\w*—\w the|strong="G3588"\w* washing \w of|strong="G2316"\w* pitchers \w and|strong="G2316"\w* cups, \w and|strong="G2316"\w* many \w other|strong="G3588"\w* similar \w things|strong="G3588"\w* you \w do|strong="G3588"\w*.”

\w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G2532"\w* \w on|strong="G2443"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w You|strong="G5210"\w* \w neatly|strong="G2573"\w* \w set|strong="G2443"\w* aside \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w command|strong="G1785"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w maintain|strong="G5083"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* own \w tradition|strong="G3862"\w*.

\w Once|strong="G3825"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G3004"\w* \w called|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w whole|strong="G3956"\w* \w crowd|strong="G3793"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w All|strong="G3956"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G3004"\w*, listen \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w Me|strong="G1473"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w understand|strong="G4920"\w*:

If anyone has ears to hear, let him hear.”

\w After|strong="G3753"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G1525"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* left \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w crowd|strong="G3793"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w gone|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w*, \w His|strong="G1519"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* inquired \w about|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w parable|strong="G3850"\w*.

\w He|strong="G1161"\w* continued: “\w What|strong="G3588"\w* \w comes|strong="G1607"\w* \w out|strong="G1537"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w a|strong="G1161"\w* \w man|strong="G1565"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w what|strong="G3588"\w* \w defiles|strong="G2840"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*.

\w Jesus|strong="G1525"\w* left \w that|strong="G3588"\w* place \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G1525"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w region|strong="G3725"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w Tyre|strong="G5184"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* Sidon. \w Not|strong="G3756"\w* \w wanting|strong="G2309"\w* \w anyone|strong="G3762"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w know|strong="G1097"\w* \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w there|strong="G2532"\w*, \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w house|strong="G3614"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w unable|strong="G3756"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w escape|strong="G2990"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w notice|strong="G2990"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G3004"\w* \w told|strong="G3004"\w* \w her|strong="G3588"\w*, “\w Because|strong="G1223"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w answer|strong="G3056"\w*, \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w go|strong="G5217"\w*. \w The|strong="G2532"\w* \w demon|strong="G1140"\w* \w has|strong="G3778"\w* \w left|strong="G1831"\w* \w your|strong="G1223"\w* \w daughter|strong="G2364"\w*.”
